creator: eric.amick@mail.house.gov
text:
Created attachment 25913
FO illustrating the problem.

When leaders are involved, it appears the line length is sometimes calculated incorrectly, leading to the line not being filled completely during layout.
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text:
simplify input test file; add output PDF showing problem: last inline (" YYY") in 2nd and 4th blocks should align with same in 1st and 3rd blocks

it appears (on an incomplete analysis) that ipd adjust is being distributed incorrectly between leader area (which should get 100% of the adjustment) and other whitespace areas (which should get 0% of the adjustment);
*** Bug 51594 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
